ArticlesArray.title: Sun-Damaged Hair and How To Revive It
ArticlesArray.subtitle: Read how to revive dry, damaged locks and how to prevent sun-damage in future with tips from John Frieda.
ArticlesArray.shortDescription: The sun, the sea, the sand! Summertime is truly the best. But like all the best things in life, there’s a slight downside - sun damage!

ArticlesArray.title: 10 Festival Hairstyles to Rock this Summer
ArticlesArray.subtitle: Here are our top 10 festival hairstyles for summer 2018.
ArticlesArray.shortDescription: There’s more to festival hair than flower crowns! To fit the bill, it’s got to be cool, and above all, functional. After all, you’re there to have fun! Flowing curls may make you look like a goddess beamed down to Glastonbury, but not so great in a muddy field.

ArticlesArray.title: Embrace Your Natural Curls with Rochelle Humes and Frizz Ease Dream Curls
ArticlesArray.subtitle: We have partnered with our ultimate curl-crush, the gorgeous, Rochelle Humes.
ArticlesArray.shortDescription: Rochelle’s recent decision to embrace her natural curls and unite the curl community, alongside her longstanding love of Frizz Ease, makes her the perfect ambassador for our Dream Curls range.

ArticlesArray.title: Bridal Hairstyles for Summer
ArticlesArray.subtitle: Bridal Hair Inspiration for Summer 2018
ArticlesArray.shortDescription: Whether you’re pinning ‘wedding hairstyles updo’ or googling ‘wedding hairstyles down’, here are our top wedding hair ideas for summer 2018.

ArticlesArray.title: 20 Hairstyles That Are Perfect for Summer Weddings
ArticlesArray.subtitle: Amazing style inspiration for the big day!
ArticlesArray.shortDescription: Alfresco summer weddings are the loveliest. But they’re also at the mercy of heat, humidity, wind and rain. We say, rather than worrying about a maintaining a perfectly sculpted and sleek style, why not opt for a romantic ’do that's carefree, a little bohemian and perhaps even welcomes a stray hair or two? Here, 20 gorgeous ideas we're stealing from real brides.

ArticlesArray.title: A Cheat’s Guide On How To Make Your Hair Colour Last Longer
ArticlesArray.subtitle: From blondes to brunettes to redheads, we give you all the tips you need for maintaining hair colour brilliance.
ArticlesArray.shortDescription: Let’s face it - your hair looks best when it’s been freshly coloured. Nothing beats that ultra-glossy, rich and lustrous look of newly tinted, highlighted or balayaged tresses. But do you find that ‘good-hair-day’ feeling fades as quickly as your hair colour does? Whether you colour your hair at home or in the salon, it’s likely you’ll ask yourself “How can I make my hair colour  last longer?”. Here, we reveal the expert-approved tricks & tips to keep your blonde glowing, your brunette rich and your red vibrant.

ArticlesArray.title: 10 Brunette Shades For Every Skin Tone
ArticlesArray.subtitle: 10 Shades of Brunette and The Skin Tone They Suit Best
ArticlesArray.shortDescription: Think blondes have more fun? Forget it! Check out the ten coolest shades of brunette hair from espresso to milk chocolate, burnt sienna, and beach brown to tawny — you’ll never hear the words ‘mouse’ and ‘brown’ in the same sentence again.

Blonde Beauty Hacks: 
8 Tips On How To Make Hair Blonder
ArticlesArray.subtitle: How to brighten blonde hair
ArticlesArray.shortDescription: Wondering how to make your hair blonder? You’re in the right place. From styling tips to eating your way to brighter hair, read below for a rundown of blonde hair hacks to give your locks the lightened lift they need.

ArticlesArray.title: Top tips for dying hair darker
ArticlesArray.subtitle: Tips and tricks before you go over to the dark side
ArticlesArray.shortDescription: Visit a reputable salon where the hair experts will be able to advise on the best way forward - including treatments like Olaplex which will condition and prepare the hair.

ArticlesArray.title: Perfect the look: Bedhead hair
ArticlesArray.subtitle: A Style Addicts Guide To Tousled Style...
ArticlesArray.shortDescription: Gently tousled, undone 'bedhead' hair was a massive trend on the catwalks this year.  But achieving this look requires more work than just rolling out of bed. We spoke to some of the U.K.'s top hair experts and asked for their advice on how to perfect the bedhead look.
